name: carbrix2
description:
carbrix 2 is still new and very young it will be geting updates but more in the updates but less ofen : controls:

wasd :movement

e: get in the car (you must be looking at it first)

b: adds physics to the car or resets

1234 for blocks wheels and engines

note: pls do not place things on the car when its in physics mode press b if its hovering you may place blocks ;)
